summary: This is an email chain from February 2019 discussing scheduling team meetings, including one regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The sender expresses frustration with the perceived lack of speed from the 'Epstein team' and suggests a meeting to understand the situation.

persons.name: Huberfeld
persons.context: Mentioned as a scheduled appointment for the sender on Tuesday after 2:30 PM.

events.title: Email discussion about team meetings
events.description: An email exchange occurs discussing scheduling team meetings for the week, including a meeting about the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from February 10-11, 2019.
The sender is frustrated with the perceived lack of speed from the 'Epstein team' handling his case.
The sender suggests a meeting to 'shed light on what's going on' with the Epstein case.
The email discusses scheduling team meetings, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity related to Epstein in early 2019.
